name: overweeningly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is too proud or confident in yourself: She appears overweeningly confident in her own talent. I was overweeningly proud of my profession. See
overweening
More examplesFewer examplesHe is overweeningly self-important.This electoral system should prevent overweeningly powerful governments.Most people found her overweeningly concerned with style.
